name: Girls Play Sport - Teen Open Gym
description: Opportunity for teen girls to play basketball in a fun game atmosphere, there is a very quick warmup and then girls pick teams and play the rest of class and get ready for high school tryouts!!
fullDescription: Opportunity for teen girls to play basketball in a fun game atmosphere, there is a very quick warmup and then girls pick teams and play the rest of class and get ready for high school tryouts!!
whatTheyOffer: Opportunity for teen girls to play basketball in a fun game atmosphere, there is a very quick warmup and then girls pick teams and play the rest of class and get ready for high school tryouts!!
howToGetIt: Register online or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
